replies.body: I honestly don't know why this is getting so much hate. I personally love this skin, it looks really cool, it has an oceanic theme, its going to be half price AND proceeds go to charity! This is a great skin, thanks Riot! :)
every1 is just upset about it because 2 years of waiting with a promise of free skin, then they find out they have to pay. That is like 99.99% of why its getting hate

You must really fail at comprehension if you don't understand the hate for Riot making us pay for _our_ regional skin (after a **two year wait**) while the other regions got their's for free, and this for some bullshit reason which is directly contradicted by the fact that other regions had gotten other free skins in addition to their regional one such as Russia and Turkey in who both got **3** skins in total (both got 2 at launch and a regional skin later on). Add to this their pathetic manipulation of negative reactions to this through the use of _charity donations_which has obviously worked its magic upon you, you are naive if you honestly believe they are donating for the sake of goodness which if truly was the case they should be donating the proceeds from all regions rather than just Oceania. I'm sorry but you must be stupid if you cannot understand the hate.

Really Riot actually don't owe us anything. The game is free and skins are optional, instead of being a spoilt child, just be happy with what you get and don't compare with what others get and at the end of the day if you don't like it don't play.

And where exactly did I claim they owed us anything? I didn't. What I actually did was **EXPLAIN** why people have been hating Riot over this, which they have every right to especially considering the past precedent I highlighted, but due to your obvious lack of comprehension skills this clearly went straight over your head.

And since **you** have brought up the topic of them not owing us anything well there is actually good argument to be made concerning this skin considering the 2 year long promise of a free regional skin when they launched the server and considering the past precedent of other regional skins being free and servers having received multiple free skins including aside of their regional one (again contradicting the reasoning Riot have given us here). But of course you will ignore such an argument and reasons why people have been hating on Riot and instead continue replying with the standard naive "But it's a free game so they don't owe anything, don't like it don't play" crap acting like Riot can do no wrong.

In all honesty, I'd like to see where Riot promised the free skin. Just because a lot of people are saying they did. I don't recall seeing any promises of such. By the by, it sounds like you are implying they owe us something by calling it 'our regional skin', particularly by the italicised our.

Honestly, the quality of the skin really does surpass the typical freebie stuff- someone put their heart into designing this, and they should be very proud with the result. 
The main thing for Rito to consider for next time is letting more people know in advance how they're going to approach server-specific content. The other skins had set a precedent, so a little more communication was required.

Still, an excellent piece of digital artwork!

i suppose that's a point. but the whole point they said before this release was they were already unhappy about setting that precedent, like. if someone says "sorry we are doing it a little differently now" we should really just accept it. i started on oce. so i never got any free skin for being here. so how come i complain less than those who have pool party ziggs, when i do not?

The fact that all other servers got their skin for free is what rubs me the wrong way. "You got pool party ziggs" well we were told that was a skin for transferring and being apart of the beta server.  Using oh its 50% and we are donating is a cop out so riot can get tax back on "donating" money. Even though its got infinite at this point and could've done it anyway from the other servers and give us our oce skin for free.

Humm...I do like the idea since it's good for charity, but it doesn't really represent Oceania as whole.
The Southern Cross is a symbol of the region but not exactly the biggest of them. :/

Just a request to Riot for future Oceania themed skins, please feature the Aboriginal/Maori and the indigenous community of Oceania. Since they're one of the main features and the oldest residents of the continent down under.
There's a lot of things you can feature just from the indigenous community, for example.
Gnar could use an aboriginal theme with his boomerang ability. {{champion:150}} 
40,000 Thousand years and counting. :)
Or what about our patriotism? Our allegiance to our countries? Our hilarious media? OUR SPORTS TEAMS?

Patriotism isn't something typically thought of when you think Oceania so most people won't even see the association.
You want a skin based on us pledging ourselves to another country - also something not typically thought of. Sure we're in the commonwealth but... what?
You want a skin based on our media - honestly every country has messed up media.
You want a skin based on a sports team - Sports teams, sure, maybe. Which one. An Australian or NZ. I guess you could make it an Aussie Rules but that's still played all over the world. It's like making a soccer themed skin and saying it's Brazilian...
What?

> [{quoted}](name=Maewi,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=WO5x66l7,comment-id=001500000000,timestamp=2015-10-10T05:39:05.360+0000)
>
> Patriotism isn't something typically thought of when you think Oceania so most people won't even see the association.

You clearly didn't pay attention in history class. If you did, you would know that during all of the wars that we have participated in throughout modern history, Australia has been overly supportive on the home front.

> You want a skin based on us pledging ourselves to another country - also something not typically thought of. Sure we're in the commonwealth but... what?

I never said anything about pledging ourselves to another country, where did you get that from? 

> You want a skin based on our media - honestly every country has messed up media.

Yes but no other country has Karl Stefanovic with fresh cow milk on his trousers.

> You want a skin based on a sports team - Sports teams, sure, maybe. Which one. An Australian or NZ. I guess you could make it an Aussie Rules but that's still played all over the world. It's like making a soccer themed skin and saying it's Brazilian...
> What?

You should know that OCE has majority of the world's greatest rugby teams. The only teams that are not from OCE that are semi-decent are Britain and, oh wait no it's just Britain.

I didn't say I didn't see that association, I said most people don't/won't. Say you're right though. Say that every knows that throughout all of our wars, we've been 'overly supportive on the home front'. 1. How is that different to America (the country that most people actually think of when the word 'patriotism' is though of)? 2. How about the people in Micronesia? Were they 'overly supportive on the homefront'?
Gonna be honest, misread this one as 'allegiance to other countries' and was like "Really? What?".
Just gonna say every country has allegiance to their own country. If you didn't it would be like saying you wanted your country to crash. They just want what's best for them in the long term.
I'm just gonna assume that the media thing is a joke because every nation has someone that they could say 'wow this guys a news presenter and funny'. You actually didn't disprove my point or anything you just said you thought one specific guy was funny (and he doesn't represent the surrounding islands anyway)
First off, I'd argue that South Africa's good as well but after that it's like: cool, we have a majority of the world's greatest rugby teams (subjective) in Australasia. That's great. Where's Polynesia's team or Micronesia's team. How about the other islands that aren't Australia and New Zealand. I feel like everyone's just forgetting about them.

Just gonna say go theme a skin based around patriotism, 'our allegiance to our countries', that one tv presenter (which somehow represents OCE) and a rugby themed skin that doesn't have the colours of New Zealand or Australia in it so there isn't arguments about how it's themed after only one of them. Oh and make sure you include elements of Micronesia and Polynesia and Melanesia.

Honestly, this is a skin that actually links everyone in OCE with no bias towards anyone and I think that's what they wanted.

I don't see how the Southern Cross isn't the perfect candidate?
It's on most of the flags in the region. We all live under it so there is no race/sex/region/religion that gets picked over any other. Couldn't have been a better pick of symbol imho

what are you on about??? this is perfect, it represents the whole of Oceania because if you have read, it is a known piece in the regions history and it is a much better idea than gnar getting just an aboriginal theme as that just represents us here in Australia.

I'm sorry but i can't be the only one that feels they put us 1st on the patch list to butter us up for 'we don't appreciate you enough to give you an actual server skin'. Yes i know they gave us pool party Ziggs, and i loved that skin, but for 2 years i, and many other players, have really wanted a skin that set us apart from the other regions, I know we're a smaller server, and there is definetley a massive stereotype that we aren't as good as the other regions. But this actually feels like riot saying we don't deserve the same as the other regions. The charity donation is nice, but why not donate the money from other servers buying it, and let us actually have a skin that expresses where we came from, Oce is a smaller community anyway and the money made from us few buying it at half price isn't even that much. I hope i'm not offending anyone i just wish for once our region could be acknowledged as special by international mmo companies. I really thought we were appreciated a lot more than this.

That isnt a stereotype, its a fact! we arent as good as the other regions. Our best team went undefeated in OCE then get smashed by BKT at wildcards AND bkt was the worst team at worlds this year. The skins $5 on sale ffs stop being a stingy baby and if you dont like the skin then dont buy it, simple.

You have to buy $10 worth of RP to get the skin and Kassadin if you don't own him, as $5 only gets you 520 RP. I've seen you comment multiple times telling people "it's only $5" which is pure misinformation, if you are going to tell people something, first double check that the thing you are saying is correct.
The first region skin of new servers that the region has to buy. It was designed for Oce players but not made for them.
so if you have to pay for a skin it demeans it? if it were "not made for them" "they" would not be able to purchase it. so much butthurt over this, its like 5 bucks at sale price. oh my gawd,
For the region skins yeah, they set a precedent where the region got their own skin. Everyone in OCE should get their skin, otherwise it is just another skin they made to make money off of us.

Instead of making it free they are donating 100% of the OCE revenue to charity, personally I think that is better, considering they are giving it to us half price too? If the price of the skin that was thought to be free is outside your budget then you probably don't need it... but if you have the few dollars available to give to charity then it is purely greed on your part.

The charity thing is just to make it seem like we aren't getting shafted, for two weeks the money is given to charity then it is going straight to Riot, also it is only the OCE region participating. Of course it is nice that money is going to charity but that isn't my point and is something that sort of came out of nowhere, they could make charity skins if they wanted(which the 50% off and money to charity would be great for) or open this sale to other regions. I'm not sad that I don't get the skin as I don't think I will ever play Kass I'm just sad OCE isn't getting it like it should.

It's an alright skin, but again, we really got screwed on this skin not being free.  Russia got multiple free skins. OCE only got Pool Party Ziggs  for people who came really early. Complete crap after making everyone wait this long, especially given all the issues the server has. Honestly, OCE feels like a second class server and gets the short end of Riot's stick often. 

Holding the vague promise of charity donations as a cynical PR move might work on some people but a lot of us can see through it, and I hate to tell you, Riot, but you're definitely going to lose some long term money from people who are going to hold a grudge.

I definitely get this skin idea and it looks cool but I don't think it really represents the Aussie culture. Seriously dress Mundo up in stubbies, thongs, green and gold face paint and an Australian flag on his back while he throws beers and shouts "oi mate" and you definitely got yourself an OCE skin.
I'm a kiwi and that'd be funny as f
our region is OCE not AUS.
Finally, I'll be able to disappoint my ganking jungler in style!

Backing this unanswered post original Post from MasterMirage 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/yHhIOYjO-letos-talk-about-the-server-skin

Announcing it earlier would've done anything.

For starters, this skin is 2 years late so we were hoping that 2 years of developing a server skin would actually represent the server. Instead, we got what seems to be a cool looking Kassadin skin with a last minute recall animation slapped on to just say "hey it's oce related now".

I still can't believe this was the design chosen over 2 years. There were so many other concepts like a Rugby themed skin (which is heavily popular in Australia, New Zealand, Fiji, Samoa etc.) that could've actually represented our server and on first glance by anyone in the region could've been actually identified as an OCEANIC skin.

When Thailanders see the Muay Thai Lee Sin skin, that's actually a skin they see on first glance and go "hey, that's our server skin".

When Latin Americans see Ghost Bridge Morgana, they can identify it from a childhood fairy tale that was told.

Show this skin to your average Oceanic player and I can guarantee you that a very small percentage of them will identify it with our server skin. It's just a very poor design.

On top of this, you guys actually have the nerve to charge our own "server" skin to your own players where EVERY OTHER SERVER has gotten their one for free (and multiple ones at that, so the Ziggs debate is useless in my opinion).

I mentioned this before but I've spent quite a bit of money on this game (well over $1000AUD) so the cost doesn't affect me at all. I just think it is a poor bloody performance and an embarrassment to even call this the Oceanic skin after 2 years of development.

You say you don't want to set a precedent but you already have and you are clearly bending it to a playerbase that has waited YEARS for their skin. I'm sorry, but in all honesty this shows that this skin was one that was already in planning for awhile with the full intention of being released for 1350 RP but with the Oceanic theme slapped on at the end.

You can say all you want about a 50% discount and charity, but we're only getting a 300 RP discount compared to OTHER servers (the skin will be 975 at release and we're getting it for 675 for 2 weeks ONLY).

Honestly I'm really disappointed, if you guys want to keep reinforcing that this is the best result you came up with after 2 years, I personally will not buy this skin or anymore RP in the future.

"The Medical Services/Research category won the server vote so the donation will go to a cause in that field. "

More information please?

I'm all for giving to charity but, because of the negative recent events between Au and NZ, I'd not feel comfortable at all 'donating' to a charity that solely benefits Au. 

The funds received need to be spread proportionally, and to clearly defined charities. 

P.S. If it goes to research, then preferably not to facilities that spray toxic crap in the eyes of beagles n bunnies.

apologies for being politically ignorant, but what did we "australia" do now? like i actually do not know. but i do trust something happened. we are a political dickshit country. especially at the moment. i like NZ.

Well, most people are aware of the relationship between NZ and Au, and how it stretches back many many years. There's always been a very tight bond between the two countries, one that was strengthened further by WWl and WWll and the creation of the ANZACs. There's always been a pretty free flow of people going back and forth between the two countries. Up until 1981 you didn't even need a passport to travel between the two, you just got on a plane (or boat lol) and went. You still don't need a VISA (work permit). If you wanted to move to Au or NZ you just went there, found somewhere to stay, got a job and got on with life. 
Recently though the Australian Govt has been treating NZ 'overstayers' in the same manner as other nationalities, which kind of flies in the face of the fact we (Kiwis) don't actually have to do anything red-tape to stay, work and live in Au. 
At last count there were an estimated 75 NZers in Detention Camps around Au and these guys and gals are getting treated no different from anyone else. And that's kinda sad and contemptful considering the special relationship between the two countries. 
One young bloke being held in 'detention' in a prison committed suicide after being told he was being 'sent home' to NZ. He wrote farewell notes to his family and killed himself. He was in his early 20s and had lived in Au since he was 4. He had no memories of NZ, no family here, no mates, no home and no job. Everything he had and was was in Australia; He considered himself an Australian.
It's kind of disgusting really. Good Buggers or Bad Bastards, I honestly can't imagine NZ doing that to the Aussies I know who live here.
If this sort of thing continues I'm afraid it will be the straw that breaks the backbone linking NZ and Au.
Sad business all round.

Sorry but to be clear, what you are complaining about is literally australia treating everyone the same. If anything, NZ already gets special treatment with the SCV. Unfortunately the argument that NZ has much less restrictions for AU citizens is irrelevant, as the flow is very much one way. NZ doesnt really have to worry about the rules for australians moving to NZ as its a very very small amount. I keep hearing this complaint by kiwis and I find it really strange, I thought kiwis were level headed, yet your complaining about not getting even MORE special treatment? Australia does not technically owe NZ anything, its a seperate country.
Epic!!
Wow nice, cant wait c:

Who created this skin, it's wonderful I reckon the Riot skin designers hit a new peek of awesome creativity (Well better then anything I'll ever do art is not my expertise.) I think it also suits Kassadin since he is from the Void and there isn't much in the emptiness of space.
{{champion:38}} who uses kassidan xD
me
Me 2 {{champion:38}} <3
I don't
i do. so 3 out of five? maybe making a kass skin was not the worst idea hey?
You missed the joke, look at my summoner name.
If and astronaut and stars had a baby
I personally don't have any negative thoughts about this, but thank you Rito. For making an effort and all the hard work to design this skin :)
I can't find the skin in the store while me friend can ;-;
I don't know why they chose  {{champion:38}}  for this skin. He's practically nonexistent at the moment.
